title: need help with storage
content:
I kept my pixel one cuz I felt I could put large files on it as everybody said that the pixel one could have 4K and original files forever. then somebody said that's correct but you can only upload high quality and express high quality whatever that means.
want to take somebody several minutes on chat to even respond to you and then you see them try to respond to you and then you hang up and for punishment they don't allow chat Voice or anything just community I think Google one and Google hardware support and all that really really suck. they get away with murder and they hang up on you.
all I want to know if there's a way to store large files audio video picture on the pixel 1 so I don't have to use my Google one storage as I said I was at 2% left.
